<title level="1" pfs="">[Pinacosaurus](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2010)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Animal](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 19

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 17

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 14
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 4">[Pinacosaurus](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2010)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Large" />
<trait label="Animal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=9" />
<trait label="Dinosaur" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=45" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #151: The Show Must Go On](/Sources.aspx?ID=21) pg. 50</row>

**Perception** +10; [low-light vision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=23)

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +13

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +5

**Dex** +0

**Con** +4

**Int** -4

**Wis** +2

**Cha** -1
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 21 

**Fort** +12 

**Ref** +8 

**Will** +8 

</row>

**HP** 70

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
tail +13 ([Backswing](/Traits.aspx?ID=173), [reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 2d6+5 bludgeoning plus Punishing Tail

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
foot +13,
**Damage** 1d8+5 bludgeoning

**Punishing Tail**   A creature hit by the pinacosaurus's tail must attempt a DC 21 Fortitude save. On a failure, it's [slowed 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=35) until the end of its next turn; on a critical failure, it's [stunned](/Conditions.aspx?ID=36) until the end of its next turn.

**[Trample](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=39)** <actions string="Three Actions" />  Small or smaller, foot, DC 21

</column>
name: Pinacosaurus
